```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(shiny)


mlbsalary_df <- read_xlsx(path = "data/MLBPlayerSalaries.xlsx")

mlbsalary_late80s <- 
  mlbsalary_df %>%
  filter(.,
         Year == "1988" | Year == "1989") %>%
  mutate(.,
         Player = fct_reorder(Player, Salary)) %>%
  filter(.,
         Team == "Los Angeles Angels")

ggplot(data = mlbsalary_late80s,
           aes(x = Player,
               y = Salary)) + geom_col() + coord_flip()
  



```
